src_original: ānanda āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan:  ekasmin samaye bhagavataḥ kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /  tatra ca kṣīreṇa kṛtyam āsīt /
tgt_original: 「佛身小疾，當用牛乳，故我到此。
勿使外道聞此麁語，彼當輕佛，便言：

src_original: kīdṛśo bata ayam eṣāṃ śāstā yaḥ svayam eva tāvad ātmānaṃ glānaṃ na śaknoti paritrātum,  kutaḥ punar glānānāṃ satvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 佛自疾不能救，安能救人？
